thread.title: Long weekend in Paris
thread.title_full: Long weekend in Paris - Review of Hotel des Arts - Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Richard V
title: Long weekend in Paris
text:
Really convenient for a trip to Paris, 5 minutes from nearest Metro, less than an hour from CDG airport and 15 minutes from Gare de Nord/Eurostar. Montmartre is perfect for tourists and hotel ticks boxes for cleanliness, helpful and knowledgeable staff, breakfast and location. Free coffee in afternoon is a bonus.
Room Tip: Bed and bathroom fine. Our room had good view of Sacre Coeur. Superior rooms are, not surprisingly... See more room tips
